title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 7 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 7 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: My son, keep my words, and lay up my commandments with thee.
lineList.cn: 我儿，你要遵守我的言语，将我的命令存记在心。

lineList.en: Keep my commandments, and live; and my law as the apple of thine eye.
lineList.cn: 遵守我的命令，就得存活。保守我的法则，（或作指教）好像保守眼中的瞳人。

lineList.en: Bind them upon thy fingers, write them upon the table of thine heart.
lineList.cn: 系在你指头上，刻在你心版上。

lineList.en: Say unto wisdom, Thou art my sister; and call understanding thy kinswoman:
lineList.cn: 对智慧说，你是我的姊妹。称呼聪明为你的亲人。

lineList.en: That they may keep thee from the strange woman, from the stranger which flattereth with her words.
lineList.cn: 他就保你远离淫妇，远离说谄媚话的外女。

lineList.en: For at the window of my house I looked through my casement,
lineList.cn: 我曾在我房屋的窗户内，从我窗棂之间，往外观看。

lineList.en: And beheld among the simple ones, I discerned among the youths, a young man void of understanding,
lineList.cn: 见愚昧人内，少年人中，分明有一个无知的少年人，

lineList.en: Passing through the street near her corner; and he went the way to her house,
lineList.cn: 从街上经过，走近淫妇的巷口，直往通他家的路去，

lineList.en: In the twilight, in the evening, in the black and dark night:
lineList.cn: 在黄昏，或晚上，或半夜，或黑暗之中，

lineList.en: And, behold, there met him a woman with the attire of an harlot, and subtil of heart.
lineList.cn: 看哪，有一个妇人来迎接他，是妓女的打扮，有诡诈的心思。

lineList.en: (She is loud and stubborn; her feet abide not in her house:
lineList.cn: 这妇人喧囔不守约束，在家里停不住脚。

lineList.en: Now is she without, now in the streets, and lieth in wait at every corner.)
lineList.cn: 有时在街市上，有时在宽阔处，或在各巷口蹲伏。

lineList.en: So she caught him, and kissed him, and with an impudent face said unto him,
lineList.cn: 拉住那少年人，与他亲嘴，脸无羞耻对他说，

lineList.en: I have peace offerings with me; this day have I payed my vows.
lineList.cn: 平安祭在我这里。今日才还了我所许的愿。

lineList.en: Therefore came I forth to meet thee, diligently to seek thy face, and I have found thee.
lineList.cn: 因此，我出来迎接你，恳求见你的面，恰巧遇见了你。

lineList.en: I have decked my bed with coverings of tapestry, with carved works, with fine linen of Egypt.
lineList.cn: 我以经用绣花毯子，和埃及线织的花纹布，铺了我的床。

lineList.en: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
lineList.cn: 我又用没药，沉香，桂皮，薰了我的榻。

lineList.en: Come, let us take our fill of love until the morning: let us solace ourselves with loves.
lineList.cn: 你来，我们可以饱享爱情，直到早晨。我们可以彼此亲爱欢乐。

lineList.en: For the goodman is not at home, he is gone a long journey:
lineList.cn: 因为我丈夫不在家，出门行远路。

lineList.en: He hath taken a bag of money with him, and will come home at the day appointed.
lineList.cn: 他手拿银囊。必到月望才回家。

lineList.en: With her much fair speech she caused him to yield, with the flattering of her lips she forced him.
lineList.cn: 淫妇用许多巧言诱他随从，用谄媚的嘴逼他同行。

lineList.en: He goeth after her straightway, as an ox goeth to the slaughter, or as a fool to the correction of the stocks;
lineList.cn: 少年人立刻跟随他，好像牛往宰杀之地，又像愚昧人带锁链，去受刑罚。

lineList.en: Till a dart strike through his liver; as a bird hasteth to the snare, and knoweth not that it is for his life.
lineList.cn: 直等箭穿他的肝，如同雀鸟急入网罗，却不知是自丧己命。

lineList.en: Hearken unto me now therefore, O ye children, and attend to the words of my mouth.
lineList.cn: 众子阿，现在要听从我，留心听我口中的话。

lineList.en: Let not thine heart decline to her ways, go not astray in her paths.
lineList.cn: 你的心，不可偏向淫妇的道。不要入他的迷途。

lineList.en: For she hath cast down many wounded: yea, many strong men have been slain by her.
lineList.cn: 因为被他伤害仆倒的不少。被他杀戳的而且甚多。

lineList.en: Her house is the way to hell, going down to the chambers of death.
lineList.cn: 他的家是在阴间之路，下到死亡之宫。
